matplotlib.pyplot as plt fig, ax = plt.subplots() t = np.linspace(0, 3, 40) g = -9.81 v0 = 12 z = g * t**2 / 2 + v0 * t v02 = 5 z2 = g * t**2 / 2 + v02 * t scat = ax.scatter(t[0], z[0], c="b", s=5,
